sprint_goal: Establish the core system foundation, including all master data models (Customer, Driver, Vehicle) and the complete Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) framework.
epic_coverage: Core System Foundation & RBAC, Master Data Management
key_deliverables: Functional RBAC system with 4 roles; CRUD for Vehicle, Customer, Driver master data.
demo_objectives: Admin creates a user for each role; Admin creates a sample vehicle, customer, and driver; Log in as a non-admin to show restricted access.
success_criteria: All master data models are stable; RBAC is enforced for all roles; All ACs for planned stories are met.
risk_factors: Incorrect ACLs or `ir.rule` can lead to security holes (RISK-006).
mitigation_strategies: Mandatory peer review for all security files; Comprehensive QA verification cycle for RBAC.
burndown_target: Linear burndown, 9 story points by end of week 1.

sprint_name: Sprint 2: Trip Lifecycle & Driver Portal MVP
sprint_goal: Implement the complete end-to-end trip lifecycle and build the Driver Portal MVP, enabling trip creation, assignment, and execution from start to delivery.
key_deliverables: Ability to create & assign trips; Functional driver portal for login, viewing trips, starting trips, and uploading POD.
demo_objectives: Dispatch Manager creates and assigns a trip; Driver logs into portal, starts the trip, and marks it as delivered with a POD.
success_criteria: A full trip can be processed from 'Planned' to 'Delivered'; Driver portal MVP is functional and responsive on mobile.
risk_factors: Complexity of custom OWL components for the driver portal; Integration of signature pad library.
mitigation_strategies: Early technical spike for signature pad integration; Continuous testing on physical mobile devices.
burndown_target: Linear burndown, 12 story points by end of week 1.

sprint_goal: Deliver the core financial workflow with GST E-Invoicing and full expense management.
key_deliverables: Driver expense submission; Manager approval workflow; Resilient GSP e-invoicing integration; Compliant PDF invoice report.
demo_objectives: Driver submits an expense; Manager approves it; Finance Officer generates a GST-compliant e-invoice for a completed trip.
success_criteria: E-invoicing workflow is functional against GSP sandbox; Expense lifecycle is complete; All ACs are met.
risk_factors: High risk from GSP API reliability and complexity (RISK-001).
mitigation_strategies: Implement resilient async workflow; Develop against a mock GSP server for CI testing.
external_dependencies: GSP API Sandbox and documentation must be available.
integration_windows: Continuous integration testing against GSP sandbox throughout the sprint.
burndown_target: Linear burndown, 10 story points by end of week 1.

sprint_goal: Deliver advanced analytics and tracking features, including the live GPS map, manager's dashboard, and key performance reports.
epic_coverage: GPS Tracking & Geofencing, Reporting, Dashboards & Alerts
key_deliverables: Real-time vehicle map view; Manager dashboard with KPIs; Driver Performance report; Vehicle Profitability report.
demo_objectives: Show live vehicle movement on the map; Demonstrate KPI cards on the dashboard and click-through navigation; Generate a performance report.
success_criteria: Map updates with <60s latency; Dashboard LCP is <3s; Reports are accurate and performant.
risk_factors: GPS pipeline performance under load (RISK-005); Odoo reporting query performance (RISK-006).
mitigation_strategies: Early load testing of the GPS pipeline; Mandatory query analysis (`EXPLAIN`) for all reporting logic.
external_dependencies: GPS Provider API sandbox must be available.
integration_windows: End-to-end testing of the full GPS pipeline.
burndown_target: Linear burndown, 15 story points by end of week 1.

sprint_goal: Finalize and validate data migration scripts and go-live readiness.
key_deliverables: Production-ready ETL scripts for all scoped data; Comprehensive data validation report from a full dry-run; Finalized go-live runbook.
demo_objectives: Demonstrate the execution of the migration dry-run in staging; Review the generated validation report showing 100% data integrity.
success_criteria: Successful dry-run with zero critical discrepancies; Validation report signed off by business stakeholders.
risk_factors: High risk from poor legacy data quality (RISK-002).
mitigation_strategies: Dedicated data profiling task; Idempotent scripts; Mandatory multiple dry-runs.
external_dependencies: Final, clean data extracts from the legacy system.
integration_windows: Final E2E testing on the migrated staging environment.
burndown_target: Front-loaded effort, targeting 20 points by end of week 1.
